education.institution: Aga Khan Higher Secondary School, Gilgit

projects.title: FYP: Enhancing Human Activity Recognition Through IoT Sensor Data Analytics: A Deep Learning Approach
projects.description: Final Year Project (July 2025) on Facial Expression Recognition (FER) using Wi-Fi CSI. Deployed dual-ESP32 for data collection, processed signals into spectrograms, trained ResNet-18 and EfficientNetV2B0 models for emotions (Neutral, Happy, Sad, Fear, Surprise). Applications: Healthcare, security, privacy-preserving HCI. Achieved high accuracy for contactless sensing.

projects.title: Aurora: RAG-based Mental Health Chatbot
projects.description: AI assistant for mental health awareness with crisis-safe responses, context retrieval from PDFs.

projects.title: DanReality: Dance-Therapy Innovation Pitch
projects.description: App fusing dance and AI for mental health ('Thinking with the Dancing Brain'). Addresses youth issues like depression, obesity via choreography and tech. Vision: Positive change through spatial programming (ideas into rhythm/flow/interaction).

internships.title: AI Development Intern, Kartoa Technologies
internships.details: Hands-on in Python, ML, GenAI, RAG, LangChain/LangGraph. Contributed to AI solutions, models, workflows, debugging, and optimization. Demonstrated analytical thinking and problem-solving.

awards.title: Ehsaas Undergraduate Scholarship
awards.description: Full tuition + Rs.40,000 annual stipend for BS Computer Engineering. Based on merit and need; requires 75-80% attendance and good performance.
